extendedInfo.description: Place Saver allows you to save locations and places so you can get back to them later. You can save your current location, or enter an address or GPS coordinates. Place Saver provides capabilities beyond the simple star function provided by Google Maps, such as allowing you to name the locations you save, storing notes about them, and adding homescreen shortcuts to them. Once saved, you can open the locations in Google Maps, navigate to them, edit them, and share them with friends. You can later search through your saved locations and their notes!You can enter addresses or GPS coordinates manually or you can share locations from Google Maps. Your approximate distance from each of your saved locations shows up right in the menu.Saved locations can also be viewed on a map in-app via the Google Maps API. Locations can be clicked on and then navigated to etc.You can also save shortcuts to saved places on your homescreen. Hold down on a homescreen, click shortcuts, click Place Saver and select your options. Shortcuts can open the saved place in Place Saver, Google Maps, Directions, or even open Navigation directly to the place!Place Saver will allow you to share locations via a Place Saver link, plain text, or a Google Maps link if saved from Google Maps. These formats can be shared via SMS, email, or any other Intent Receiver which supports plain text. Place Saver links may be opened on other devices with Place Saver and saved, allowing you to share all the information about a given location, down to the exact GPS coordinates!Features: - Save locations with custom names and notes - Save current location with GPS coordinates - Save a location by entering an address or GPS coordinates - Save locations from Google Maps Share menuh - Open locations in Google Maps - View saved locations on an in-app map - Start navigation to saved locations - Create homescreen shortcuts to open or navigate to saved locations - Create homescreen shortcuts to save your location - Search through your saved locations and notes via text or voice search - Share saved locations via SMS, email, etc. - Directly dial phone numbers or open web links saved in notes - Sort locations by name, distance, or when you saved them - Search integration with Google Search app (just enable it in the Google Search app options)Permissions: - Coarse Location - To use network location to get approximate distance to saved locations - Fine Location - To get and save current location - Internet - To look up addresses to get location and distance to locationKeywords: PlaceSaver, Save Place, Save My Location, Save Current Location, Save Location, Location Saver, Places, Locations, Bookmark Location, Remember Location, Star Location, Star Place, Remember Place, Enter GPS Location, Places App, Geo Bookmark, Bookmarking

reviews.title: Must have!!!
reviews.comment: This app never crashes for me.  It\'s truly one of the few apps I couldn\'t live without.
reviews.author: john rasmussen

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Now, I am able to put in multiple locations and navigate closest first
reviews.author: JB Badalyan

reviews.comment: Its crashing relentlessly on my samsung galaxy tab running on ics....very disappointed
reviews.author: Amitangshu Acharya

reviews.title: Innovative n Practical Solution
reviews.comment: Simply Great n hates off to developer as he identified what so  called  Giant Google completely ignored. This help me to save all location on maps with flexibility to name as per my requirements. Just one suggestions - if you can give us option to share my saved location to another of my friend who also have place saver. I know sharing option is available but it should share as place saver contact when I share it with my friend. Similar like how we share business card.
reviews.author: Rajnish Sood

reviews.title: Crasher
reviews.comment: It always crash when I save or edit a place. I have to immediately click the Save button the moment it locks on the location so that I can save it. During editing, if GPS is turned on and the moment it locks on the location while I\'m still editing, it crashes.
reviews.author: Alfrenido Cenera

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: As soon as I hit the maps icon, it crashes everytime.
reviews.author: Stephen Coleman

reviews.title: Export and Import
reviews.comment: How to export/import my list of locations?
reviews.author: Ahmed Ibrahim

reviews.title: First app for me to comment on
reviews.comment: Kudos.....first app i have commented on and i have been using android a year and a half now.I can save my current location and then from places then click of my saved places and it opens navigation to take me there. Cant you sell this to google for a fortune ?
reviews.author: Norman Grove

reviews.title: Good alternative to HTC Footprints
reviews.comment: No longer have a HTC and missing the Footprints app.  This is a very good alternative.  However when try and enter co-ordinates manually it will not accept a \',\' or \'-\' so no way to enter.  Please fix and will be an excellent app with 5*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Samsung GIO, cannot get very far before it crashes, needing a forced close. Pity because using Google\'s starred places is useless. No sorting, no renaming - how do a recognize the name of a place by its address. Surely my friends name or whatever is much more sensible. I cannot believe how GMaps can be so featureless.
reviews.author: Neville Young

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: I have hundreds of places to keep track from my contacts . Let\'s see how it does when I load them up. So far works like it says and exactly what I needed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sounds great if it would work
reviews.comment: Trying to find a good app to mark offshore fishing spots with a navigator so i can get back to them. Thought this might be the one but it crashes on the map but i will keep checking incase of an update
reviews.author: Steve Cato

reviews.title: The only Alternative to HTC Footprints
reviews.comment: I just moved from HTC to Samsung & greatly miss HTC Footprints. After a long search, I found this app & this is the only app with that functionality & speedy recording of ur location (3 clicks). The app still is in it\'s infancy & missing a lot of bells & whistles of Footprints. But it does the core functionality of Footprints & it does it very well which is record ur location / locations & navigate u from any point to your saved locations. It is a life saver for me & wish there was a way to contribute to this developer\'s work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app!
reviews.comment: Solves the save my locations in google maps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app!
reviews.comment: Love it so far. The only thing I\'m really missing are folders since the list can become very cluttered.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for. Works flawlessly. I like how it gives you the option of using other navigation apps you already have. For example, if im without a data signal, I can use copilot. 5 stars!
reviews.author: j perez

reviews.comment: amazing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Wonderful, easy to use app. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent, great idea!
reviews.comment: This is the kind of creativity that the Android Market needs.
reviews.author: CD Rasmussen

reviews.comment: Crashed after installation
reviews.author: A Google User
